short_description: This building block generates reports from raw results of multiple drug screenings (for example multiple cell lines). It takes as input a folder containing multiple results for each individual screening (cell line). It returns multiple reports in a result folder, including figures and summary values.
long_description: This building block generates reports from raw results of multiple drug screenings (for example multiple cell lines). It takes as input a folder containing multiple results for each individual screening (cell line). It returns multiple reports in a result folder, including figures and summary values.
